The official website for Swingaholics

Welcome to Swingaholics website

Who are we?

We are a Barcelona based association dedicated for people who are passionate about swing music and its different ball disciplines: lindy-hop, balboa, blues i shag.

What is Swing?

Swing dance is a group of dances that developed with the swing style of jazz music in the 1920sâ€“1940s, with the origins of each dance predating the popular "swing era". Hundreds of styles of swing dancing were developed; those that have survived beyond that era include Lindy Hop, Balboa, Collegiate Shag, and Charleston.

Today, the best-known of these dances is the Lindy Hop, which originated in Harlem in the early 1930s. While the majority of swing dances began in African American communities as vernacular African American dances, some influenced swing-era dances, like Balboa, developed outside of these communities.

What do we do?

Does it have swing in it? chances are we do it. Here's a list of some the events we organize

  • Swing dance classes
  • Swing on the Beach
  • Swing kids
  • Swing brunch
  • Swing a la 20s
  • Swing in disguise (Halloween & Xmas)
  • Swingaholics Festival

The Swingaholics Festival

Among the numerous events we're involved in, from live music to dance jams, we are proud to be the organizers of The Swingaholics Festival Barcelona. The biggest of its kind in Spain, The Swingaholics Festival is an annual gathering of professionals as well as passionates of swing dance and music from around the globe to perform, celebrate and enjoy the swing era. Full of life and energy, this event takes places every summer in different areas of the city of Barcelona for every designated activity.
